content.rendered:
Maple Ave Morning Announcements 

Monday April 28, 2025 

Today is an “B” Day 

  •  Knitting Club Cancelled for Monday 4/28 

 

  • The Science Club will not meet today. The next meeting will be on May 5. 

 

  • The Bagpiping Club will meet today in Ms. Barber’s room. 

 

*Today’s lunch is chicken nuggets, seasoned pasta, steamed peas and carrots with apple slices.  

 

 Be Safe, Be Respectful, Be responsible and Be KIND! 

 

As Always, make it a great day or not… the choice is yours.
